document_data.mainbody:
Ciara Blank was a laborer and a printer who worked for the Baldurs Mouth Gazette in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Ciara was a dark-skinned gold dwarven woman. She wore commoners clothes and kept her face clean-shaven.
In the , Ciara lost her printing job Baldurs Mouth after the broadsheets editor-in-chief, Ettvard Needle, received a gift of an enchanted printing press from Lord Enver Gortash. Ciara lamented the changing times but critiqued the Gazette over its poor paper quality and smudgy ink.
